title: Claimed by the Alpha
description: Sapphire's idiot brother Mark has gone and got himself in a heap of trouble...again. To save him from certain death, Sapphire must travel across country to meet the Alpha who Mark crossed and hope he's in a forgiving mood.But complications arise when Sapphire finds herself launching her body at Alpha Blackwater. Caught between her own carnal desires and her responsibility to help her brother, Sapphire must make a choice, and fast.Will she save her brother's hide and leave Sin? Or will the Alpha's pull be too strong for her to break?
author: Joanna  Wilson
